src:
Očajni Fener i veliki preokret Žalgirisa! Šaras uzeo meru Žocu u poslednjim sekundama
Grigonisova trojka na sedam sekundi pre kraja i promašaj Veselog presudili - 76:79

01 Nov 2019


Kad udari Fenerbahče na Žalgiris poslednjih sezona to su obično vrlo neizvesne utakmice, pa je tako bilo i večeras, pravi triler! Ranjena ekipa Željka Obradovića čekala je izazivača kog predvodi Šarunas Jasikevičijus, i ponovo je Fener pokazao koliko ne može da se sastavi ove sezone. Imao je sve u svojim rukama, a onda serijom loših poteza sve prosuo u poslednjim sekundama, a Žalgiris slavi Grigonisa koji je doneo Zelenoj šumi pobedu košem na sedam sekundi pre kraja - 79:76.

Žalgiris je imao napad, Grigonis je izvukao čudesno šut za dva iz reketa i pogodio za prednost Žalgirisa od 77:76. Fener je imao sedam sekundi za napad, lopta je otišla na Jana Veselog, on nije pogodio i tu je bio kraj. Na kraju je, posle slobodnih bacanja Grigonisa, Slukas šutirao trojku preko celog meča za produžetak, ali nije bio precizan.
Fenerbahče ima pet poraza u prvih šest utakmica! Ko je to mogao da očekuje? Nije pomoglo ni domaćinu što je Nando de Kolo dao 29 poena. Marijus Grigonis je dao 19 za goste, dok je Zek Ledej dodao 16.
Navikli su nas Fenerbahče i Žalgiris na snažne utakmice, neizvesne, sa dobrim potezima, dobrim odbranama i skoro uvek su neizvesne. Tako je bilo i večeras u meču u kom se Fener odlepio u prvom poluvremenu, a onda Žalgiris uspeo da se vrati i kao i u većini utakmica Evrolige ove sezone išlo se u neizvesnu završnicu. Fener ove sezone ne liči na sebe, ima strahovito mnogo problema, pre ovog meča se nalazio na pretposlednjem mestu na tabeli i od pet utakmica imao je samo jednu pobedu.
Delovalo je sve vrlo neizvesno tokom treće deonice kada je Obradović počeo da poprima onaj svoj karakterističan izraz i boju lica, posebno u momentima kada je Ledej uspevao da ostvari prednost ispod koša u odnosu na Lovernja i u odbrani i u napadu.



Dobrom igrom Nanda de Koloa i Kostasa Slukasa na ovoj utakmici Fenerbahče je uspeo da se održi u prednosti, ali Žalgiris je ponovo demonstrirao koliko je nezgodna i žilava ekipa. Morate više puta da ih pobediti u jednoj utakmici da bi poklekli. To je Fener večeras naučio na teži način.
Važne poene u poslednjoj četvrtini dali su Nando de Kolo i Derik Vilijams koji je prostrelio trojku koja je malo skinula kamen sa srca navijačima. I to navijačima koji su do sada sve i svašta pretrpeli iako je tek start sezone. Naravno, Žalgiris se do kraja ponovo vratio, a Datome i Vilijams su sa tri koša malo smirili goste i koliko toliko olakšali celu situaciju domaćinu. Fener od ove sezone ne bi bio Fener da nije počeo da komplikuje, a uspeo je i da prospe prednost od 74:67.
To je Žalgiris iskoristio i košem Grigonisa, te promašajem Veselog stigao do velikog skalpa. I nije prvi put da Žalgiris dobija u Istanbulu.
U drugoj utakmici u istom terminu Valensija je dočekala Lion i uspela da slavi protiv ekipe koja se ipak najbolje snalazi na svom, domaćem parketu - 81:72. Za španski tim je igrao Vanja Marinković, na parketu je proveo 15 minuta, a ubacio je šest poena.

EVROLIGA - 6. KOLO


Četvrtak

Crvena zvezda - Himki 90:78/Simanić 18 - Šved 14/
Panatinaikos - Anadolu Efes 86:70/Rajs 18 - Larkin 28/

Petak

Zenit - CSKA 70:87/Ajon 20 - Džejms 16/
Fenerbahče - Žalgiris 76:79/De Kolo 29 - Grigonis 19/
Valensija - Asvel 81:72/Dubljević 13 - Livio 20/

text:
Desperate Fener and the Great Turn of Zalgiris! Saras took the measure of Zoc in the final seconds
Grigonis' threesome - 76:79 - seven seconds before the end and Merry Failure missed

01 Nov 2019


When Fenerbahce hits Zalgiris in recent seasons, these are usually very uncertain matches, and so it was tonight, a real thriller! Zeljko Obradovic's injured squad was waiting for a challenger led by Sarunas Jasikevicius, and again Fener showed how much he couldn't put together this season. He had everything in his hands, and then a series of bad moves spilled everything in the final seconds, and Zalgiris celebrates Grigonis, who brought the Green Forest the victory with a basket seven seconds before the end - 79:76.

Zalgiris had an attack, Grigonis pulled a marvelous shot for two from the racket and struck for Zalgiris' 77:76 advantage. Fener had seven seconds to attack, the ball went to Jan Veselog, he did not hit and that was the end. In the end, after free throws by Grigonis, Slukas kicked a threesome throughout the entire match for an overtime, but was not precise.
Fenerbahce has five losses in their first six games! Who could have expected that? It did not help the host, as Nando de Colo gave 29 points. Marius Grigonis gave 19 for the guests, while Zek Ledej added 16.
We are accustomed to Fenerbahce and Zalgiris in strong games, uncertain, with good moves, good defenses and almost always uncertain. So it was tonight in a match in which Fener went blind in the first half, and then Zalgiris managed to come back and, as in most Euroleague games this season, went into the uncertain final. This season's fan does not look like himself, he has a lot of problems, before this match he was in the penultimate place on the table and from five games he had only one victory.
It seemed very uncertain during the third section when Obradovic began to take on his characteristic expression and complexion, especially at times when Ledej managed to gain an advantage under the basket over Loverne both in defense and attack.



With the good play of Nando de Colo and Costas Slucas in this match, Fenerbahce managed to keep the lead, but Zalgiris again demonstrated how difficult and tough the team was. You have to beat them several times in one game to kneel. That's what Fener learned the hard way tonight.
Important points in the last quarter were given by Nando de Colo and Derrick Williams who shot a trio that slightly removed the stone from the hearts of the fans. And to the fans who have suffered everything and everything so far, although it is only the beginning of the season. Of course, Zalgiris returned again by the end, and Datome and Williams with a three-pointer calmed down the guests a bit and made the whole host situation so much easier. Fener would not have been Fener this season if he hadn't started to complicate, and he also managed to shed a 74:67 advantage.
This was also used by Zalgiris with a basket of Grigonis, and by the miss of Merry he reached a large scalp. And it is not the first time that Zalgiris has won in Istanbul.
In the second game in the same term Valencia welcomed Lyon and managed to celebrate against the team that still manages best on their home floor - 81:72. Vanja Marinkovic played for the Spanish team, spent 15 minutes on the floor, and scored six points.

EUROLEAGUE - DAY 6


Thursday

Red Star - Khimki 90: 78 / Simanic 18 - Swede 14 /
